name: The Representatives of the Pope Attempting to Reconcile the Fighting Parties
description: The Representatives of the Pope Attempting to Reconcile the Fighting Parties; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Illuminated: Bruges, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 22.5 x 18.6 cm (8 7/8 x 7 5/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 14; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Representatives of the Pope Attempting to Reconcile the Fighting Parties
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment
